name: Sumo X
description:
EXTREME SUMO 

Sumo X is a one-button physics based game about smashing people off of platforms. 

Sit on the couch with a friend and push, slide, or dive them into the lava pit.

FEATURES
  • Local multiplayer only. Grab a friend and sit them on the couch for a good time. 
  • Awesome futurefunk soundtrack by Yung Bae.
  • 8 different arenas. 
  • Play on the keyboard or with gamepads
